website_summaries.verdict: If you don't mind the extra time spent cleaning, this product is well worth the price. You won't find a better all-around roaster on the market.
pros: A top choice for its even heating and exceptionally high-quality stainless steel construction
cons: Lacks a nonstick surface, which means you have to manually scrub it

customer_reviews.title: Just great quality, weight
customer_reviews.text: Just great quality, weight, and price. Cleans up well. Being a professional cook it is like restaurant quality pro cookware. Buy this. I looked at a ton of these in great detail on many pro sites. This is the keeper out of everything I have seen. At this price range, you simply cant beat the quality. You will have this for years. The side handles are fused. This is what you want...heats evenly and I even made gravy on the top of the stove after the bird was done. Proved to heat evenly and was excellent. Cant even tell you how many pans I have thrown away for this reason alone. Even heat is everything. Spot on in every way.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Kitty

customer_reviews.title: Pan arrived in box previously opened w/o recipe card enclosed ...
customer_reviews.text: Pan arrived in box previously opened w/o recipe card enclosed contrary to the box label. Pan definitely cannot be used to make gravy on stove top after removing turkey due to raised center of interior bottom. Confirmed this with Cephalon. Do not rely on Americas Test Kitchen for rec. Other quality pans in same category confirm their pans are adequate for making gravy on stove top.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy pan
customer_reviews.text: Works well. Cooked a huge turkey in it and it was wonderful for making gravy in afterwards. I put the pan across two burners on the cooktop and was able to make the gravy without getting out another pan. Works well for roasting. Wish I had bought it years ago. The only challenge is finding a place in the kitchen to store it because it is quite large.
customer_reviews.author: Teri Elliott

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PAN!
customer_reviews.text: America's Test Kitchen rated this the best roasting pan available. It is large enough to roast most anything and it is dishwasher safe which is awesome for cleanup. High quality, great handles make it easy to grab even with oven mitts on, and it is deep to trap all the dripping from anything you cook or to fill with veggies. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle R

customer_reviews.title: The Best Roasting Pan!
customer_reviews.text: I bought another brand and was never happy with it. Saw the ATK review on this and put it on my wishlist. Used it yesterday for the first time and love it! Perfect size, great handles, and the Stainless Steel surface after a quick soak in hot water and Dawn totally cleaned. Seriously, it's gleaming. Oh -- and the turkey and stuffing came out perfect! Can't wait to use it (and the rack) for my Christmas roast!
customer_reviews.author: Cathie Clark

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE
customer_reviews.text: LOVE LOVE LOVE, can't say that enough times about this product! I like to cook and I cook a lot and use this all the time, I actually took it with my when looking at stoves because if this didn't fit I wasn't getting that stove! This is the perfect bird/roast cooker and gravy maker. Every kitchen needs to have this, no matter the size of what you're cooking the design of this will work. The end handles curve it which makes other things fit easily in the stove with it, the inner rack is durable and easy to clean. I do hand wash this, as I do with all my cookware, but it's worth it! Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Kristy

customer_reviews.title: Better than most roasting pans on the market
customer_reviews.text: Pan is nice and sturdy with good handles where I don't have to fear being burned, like my old pan. I have two concerns: 1. I had seen the product reviewed on America's Test Kitchen, but the roasting rack moves around more than I expected vs. what ATK's review indicated. That said, so far I haven't had any problems. 2. The pan didn't come as clean as I thought it would in the dishwasher after the first use. The bright, shiny surface isn't so shiny anymore but I don't want to scrub the residue with steel wool for fear it would permanently scratch the pan.
customer_reviews.author: Medieval lady

customer_reviews.title: Great but handles can be frustrating.
customer_reviews.text: Made a 15.5lb turkey this year and it performed great. The only design flaw we saw was that our recipe called for flipping the bird over halfway thru cooking and because the handles curve inward, it was difficult to do so without having our hands hit the hot handles or have the legs of the bird get caught on the handles. Wish they had made the handles on the outer edge of the pan or less curved. Other than that it was great and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Villasenor

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: America's Test Kitchen hit the nail right on the head. It is more expensive then other roasting pans, but I have not cooked a bad meal yet with this pan. I am able to fit 6 large chicken breasts in the pan and they all cook consistently through. It can handle two large chickens or one large turkey with no problem. My favorite thing is the fact that it cleans easily and still looks new. So many other roasting pans I have had and have seen look old and battered way before their time. I plan on having this one for many many years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Terence

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Roasting Pan
customer_reviews.text: We love this roasting pan ! It is made very well and the price point is good considering some of the other brands $$$ in it's class. The other thing I liked very much, the pan had higher sides and a breeze to clean up. It has roasted a turkey, vegetables, pork roast, and recently a rib roast. I like the handles as I or my husband could get a good grip on the pan to remove it from the hot oven without my hands hitting the sides of my 30 inch range. This pan also performed well making the gravy on top of the range too.
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I refused to cook another turkey until I had a new roasting pan. This mysteriously appeared on my doorstep four days later. It is wonderful. It's easy to clean and provides plenty of room below the rack for vegetables or using various utensils for basting. Now, instead of thinking "I'd make that, but then I'll have to clean that stupid pan", I think "I'm going to make that."
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: After forty years of cooking, I wanted to buy a roaster that last. I have been through several. I also didn't want one with a nonstick surface. So far I used it for roasting two turkey breasts (at the same time), a standing rib roast and a whole turkey. It cleans up well. It did discolor a little after use but I expected that. I did not spray it with Pam. Instead I coated it with olive oil before I put the meat in it. It did not take much work to clean it up. I like the handles. They make putting it in and taking it out of the oven easy. Good work Calphalon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Roaster
customer_reviews.text: This is a great roaster. My only two issues are that the rack moves a bit too much and the handles curve inward. I attempted to fit an oversized turkey in the pan and the handles were in the way. If they were straight up or outward it would have fit easily. The good is that it is very sturdy, has a good depth and it didn't seem to create hot spots. The pan is not thin and flimsy like some I've seen.
customer_reviews.author: RIRedd

customer_reviews.title: I am THRILLED with this product and the roasting rack cleans up EASILY, too
customer_reviews.text: WOW! I used this to roast the Christmas turkey and it made a MASSIVE difference in the finish of the bird. I never realized how much a roasting pan could aid me in the kitchen. I am THRILLED with this product and the roasting rack cleans up EASILY, too!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Great roaster
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this roasting pan for a few years now. The best feature is the shiny stainless interior, perfect for deglazing for a sauce/gravy after roasting. Pour in some liquid, scrape around with a wooden spatula and that's it (and the roaster practically cleans itself). It shows some wear, but I roast a chicken every week in it. Depending on what you roast, the smaller version may be fine for you. I just bought another for a friend as a Xmas gift. It's $129 direct from Calaphon, with free shipping (at least as of 12/12), thereby saving enough to buy that Xmas goose....
customer_reviews.author: T. Meyer

customer_reviews.title: glad I bought this
customer_reviews.text: I've cooked a couple of hams in it, as well as a few other things and I really like it. I'm really surprised how easy it is to clean. The handles are just the right size.
customer_reviews.author: The Supply Guy

customer_reviews.title: Great, except for the handles
customer_reviews.text: The inward-facing handles are a problem with a hot pan. A real challenge to get hot pads or gloves in there and safely move this thing in and out of the oven when hot.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin J. Manuele

customer_reviews.title: Great Roasting Pan
customer_reviews.text: I've used a lot of roasting pans over the years, but this is by far one of the best. I ordered ours just in time for Thanksgiving. Roasting the turkey was a dream. The pan was heavy duty and sturdy. It distributed the heat well. The rack kept the bird out of the grease. The handles allowed for easy removal from the oven. My husband said cooking with the pan was a real pleasure and he's looking forward to using it for the Christmas Goose. I also recommend getting turkey forks to ease lifting the bird/item from the pan to the platter. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: J. L. R. Reed

customer_reviews.title: Great design though the grate could use some help.
customer_reviews.text: The curved corners are great for saucing and also for cleaning. The handles curve in which shrinks the opening a little but also makes an easier fit in the oven. So far i love it.
customer_reviews.author: Hieu N.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This was a tough one to decide on. A very expensive purchase for me. Thanksgiving was coming and I needed a roasting pan. I looked at several models and many were cheaper. I finally decided on this one and I am so glad I did. This one cleans up so easy, the turned in handles are great, and is a very high quality all stainless roaster. Keep in mind that this is the last roasting pan you will ever have to buy so it is worth the investment.
customer_reviews.author: PJC

customer_reviews.title: works fine
customer_reviews.text: As noted in other reviews this needs to be preheated and then oiled before adding whatever it is you are going to roast. Use this for company and for when need two roasting pans. For everyday use there is the anodized aluminum version which I have abused for 20 years.
customer_reviews.author: P. Bolton

customer_reviews.title: Shiny
customer_reviews.text: I like shiny things and this is still gleaming after making three turkeys over thanksgiving and a prime rib for Wednesday (something's got to get you through the week). The only reason I gave it 4 stars was when boiling water over 2 burners bubbles were on the surface of the whole pan but the water was only boiling over the burners. My understanding was that the three ply was supposed to make a complete even heated surface, this almost did that. I don't have a better pan to compare this to, so this might deserve 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: GonzzoVT

customer_reviews.title: Excellent roasting pan
customer_reviews.text: We used this to roast prime rib, and it came out perfectly. Great quality!
customer_reviews.author: Mr ATC

customer_reviews.title: Great Roaster
customer_reviews.text: We love this roaster. It is heavy, easy to clean and a great value.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Adams

customer_reviews.title: Good Pan not so good rack
customer_reviews.text: Pan is very nice, however the rack coating started to flake off after only one use at Thanksgiving. I would rather have a non coated SS rack and scrub it after every use then to wonder how much Teflon (or whatever that coating is), is remaining on my food or in the drippings that would be used for gravy.
customer_reviews.author: Mark W.

customer_reviews.title: Warped a little
customer_reviews.text: Used it for the first time last week (11/28/13) and only had temperature to 350 and it warped a bit. Not sure if that is normal. Seemed to go back a bit after cooling. But first stainless roaster I've owned.
customer_reviews.author: Jaymo

customer_reviews.title: This is the last roaster that you will need to buy.
customer_reviews.text: This Christmas, I made the best turkey ever. The pan does make a difference. Other reviewers complained about the coating on the rack. I found no problems with it. I have made two turkeys with this roaster. I do was the rack and pan by hand, although I would not hesitate to wash the pan in the dishwasher. It is best, in my experience, to wash and scrub items like the coated rack by hand.
customer_reviews.author: Les BarrettTop Contributor: Woodworking

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, but a bit overpriced
customer_reviews.text: This is very sturdy, good quality and the handles on the roasting rack makes things very easy. I think it is a bit overpriced, even for Calphalon, but its a very solid product.
customer_reviews.author: Irish4TW

customer_reviews.title: I really wish that I had purchased a different roaster.
customer_reviews.text: I really wish that I had purchased a different roaster. The handles curve inwards towards the roast, which makes the use of pot holders unnecessarily difficult. The rack is far too small for the pan, and does not come close to fitting, so it slides all over the place. Design before function. It is extremely well-made, and should last a lifetime. But I have a feeling that I will get tired of those flaws and will give this away and buy another.
customer_reviews.author: ScottS

customer_reviews.title: pretty amazing...really.
customer_reviews.text: yes -- difficult to get excited about spending more than $100 on baking pan but results are worth it. we replaced a similar BLACK cast-iron pan that constantly burned roasted veggies (when cooked with chicken, etc). This reflective pan is amazing and does exactly what you would hope... cook items without the burn (ie. will not get too hot and evalorate the juices from drippings). highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: GarrettA

customer_reviews.title: Great Roasting Pan
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these for myself about 1 1/2 years ago and really enjoy using it. It's a large pan so you don't use it every day but for roasting a turkey or a couple of chickens it's terrific. I gave this recent one to my sister-in-law who entertains a lot. We were both surprised that after cooking a turkey in the pan looks like a cleaning nightmare when you're done but it really cleans up very easily, no hard scrubbing required.
customer_reviews.author: Trials rider

customer_reviews.title: great quality pan
customer_reviews.text: The pan held a 24lb turkey without a problem. Having a coated rack made cleanup much easier. Needed this type of pan for an induction cooktop and it worked perfectly. Always make gravy in the pan on the cooktop after the turkey is finished and it performed flawlessly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bottom is not flat as it is described.
customer_reviews.text: The claim to have a flat bottom is not accurate. It has a rectangular raised area that makes a definite slope toward the perimeter ... a grease trough, I guess. But it makes the heating area uneven and drippings don’t brown evenly across the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Marymac

customer_reviews.title: Perefect for all applications of a roasting pan including stove top use
customer_reviews.text: after encountering recipes that call for using a roasting pan on the stove top I realized after setting my smoke alarm many times that I needed a roasting pan better suited for that use. The pan is well balanced, not too heavy and works great on the stove for those more intricate recipes such as found on America's Test Kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Brian D Klaus

customer_reviews.title: Substantial
customer_reviews.text: We use it all the time from chicken to large turkey. The rack cleans easily with no loss of Teflon - with over a year of hand washing. The pan is heavy enough to be substantial without being to much to handle. You can use on the stove top as well for making gravy. The handles seemed awkward at first but in fact work well, as they allow for the additional bulk of pot holders or mitts.
customer_reviews.author: WOODY

customer_reviews.title: She used it days later on a turkey and loved it. I was especially impressed by the thickness ...
customer_reviews.text: Gave this as a Christmas gift to my daughter. She used it days later on a turkey and loved it. I was especially impressed by the thickness of the pan. High quality for sure. Wish I would have bought one for me.
customer_reviews.author: Sherian

customer_reviews.title: Bought it the day before Thanksgiving
customer_reviews.text: ...and it was WONDERFUL. Can't wait to roast again. This pan was great!
customer_reviews.author: Timo Warwick

customer_reviews.title: Really good value for the money
customer_reviews.text: Really good value for the money. It fits nicely in the dishwasher and has a high guilty steel and it has very thick bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Hank Jansen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect roasting pan
customer_reviews.text: I love this roaster. It takes a 25 lb turkey with room to spare. Just like everything Calphalon sells it's very durable too. Thick and heavy metal and the rack is nice since it's coated with a heat proof plastic that makes cleanup a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful roasting pan with a rack that is curved, not in a V-shape making it quite useful. This pan could easily be used to serve a roast or turkey. I like the upright handles, making for easy grip on the pan.
customer_reviews.author: desert dorie

customer_reviews.title: It slides around so much and almost seems like it was not made for this particular pan
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty roaster. Only thing that bothers me is the inner rack. It slides around so much and almost seems like it was not made for this particular pan. For a nice Calphalon product like this, it really makes me wonder what they were thinking making it that way.....
customer_reviews.author: jenn

customer_reviews.title: Great roaster
customer_reviews.text: Had it delivered on the 23rd just in time for Thanksgiving I bought a 14 pound turkey a butter ball from our local publix came put great and pan was easy to clean so glad I bought it .
customer_reviews.author: Robert J. Dodge

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't believe how easily this cleaned up. I bought Bar Keepers Friend as the instructions recommended, but it really cleaned up well without it - I still used to to get every spot out, but it was great. My turkey wasn't too large, but it fit perfectly and would have fit a much larger one.
customer_reviews.author: CLFnyc

customer_reviews.title: Super Pan!
customer_reviews.text: It's a pleasure to cook with this roasting pan and rack. I can fit in all sorts of vegetables to bake at the same time as a roast. It's also a breeze to clean. I couldn't recommend it more highly!
customer_reviews.author: karyn

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and size roasting pan, but nonstick rack was not a good choice
customer_reviews.text: It's a good quality roasting rack, sturdy stainless steel with a good finish. The handles lip in, so no issue with the pan being unable to fit because bad flared out handles. Does not clean as easily as I would like it, so for those concerned it might not look brand new after a month of use. As for the non stick rack, it really shouldn't be here, considering it cannot withstand high temperatures before the nonstick coating with start to peel off. It hasn't seen any use in my kitchen, as I prefer to roast on a bed of vegetables.
customer_reviews.author: SC

customer_reviews.title: Roasted Brined Turkey
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this open roaster to replace an old aluminum closed top roaster which had been handed down. We read in Cooks magazine that this type of roaster was highly recommended for cooking a turkey. We were NOT disappointed. We brined our turkey in salt water over night per the recipe, cooked it in this roaster and not only was it the prettiest turkey we have cooked these past 44 years, it was also moister than any turkey we've ever cooked. Everyone raved about how moist it was! So, this roaster and Cooks.com brined turkey recipe are definite winners!
customer_reviews.author: carl masker

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Thanksgiving's 12 lb turkey fit perfectly. Why did I wait so long to upgrade?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Raised center
customer_reviews.text: The center is raised so I assume it’d burn fond over the stovetop. I returned it without trying.
customer_reviews.author: Henry Goldman

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: After being married for 40 years, I decided I needed a really good roasting pan. When I read about this pan in America's Test Kitchen Family Cookbook, I decided to order. Although a little pricey, I am not disappointed. This is a great pan and easy to clean up after using.
customer_reviews.author: Luann Graf

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: My husband's favorite gift. Not too heavy but sturdy, great handles and big enough for large meals without being unwieldy. Love calphalon.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Morsching

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Works great. I upgraded from a Chinese cheapy. The only problem is the handles hit my broiler burner.
customer_reviews.author: Old Guy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect roasting pan for a Thanksgiving turkey.
customer_reviews.text: Loved this roasting pan. It worked great for a 25lb turkey. It is very sturdy but not too heavy and the rack to hold the turkey is great too. Makes it much easier to turn it over.
customer_reviews.author: Roberta M. Allan

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars!
customer_reviews.text: Great product easy to clean we are very pleased with this product and highly recommend it. I gave one to my mom and she loves it as well.
customer_reviews.author: K. Carter

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size, great weight. Love the handles and the interior rack.
customer_reviews.author: dorothy v

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality stainless steel pan
customer_reviews.text: This is s quality pan/rack for a ham turkey roast you name it
customer_reviews.author: Keith

customer_reviews.title: Have always wanted a good roaster pan
customer_reviews.text: Have always wanted a good roaster pan. Chose this one based on the test results from America's Test Kitchen results. The only thing I don't care for is the rack slides around a bit too much. I solved it by buying a silicone baking sheet and cutting off each end. (I chose one with a spike pattern that is used when you want to oven bake fried chicken. This allows the rack to sit between the spikes). No more slipping!
customer_reviews.author: hippie

customer_reviews.title: This roasting pan is outstanding.
customer_reviews.text: Roasted a pork loin and a couple of hens. The roasting pan was outstanding and so were my meals. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautifully crafted. Sturdy, well made. Also works and performs excellently.
customer_reviews.author: JoeTool

customer_reviews.title: Going to do the other top of the prime rib on Valentine's day
customer_reviews.text: It was great I cook the prime rib on it loved it
customer_reviews.author: Harvey Hastings

customer_reviews.title: good for roasting veggies
customer_reviews.text: I bought this after a good review from cook's illustrated and am very happy with it. I have only used it for vegetables so far, but it does a good job and is easy to use. I hat have not used the rack but is feels very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Grace

customer_reviews.title: This thing is great! It cleans easily which is such a relief ...
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great! It cleans easily which is such a relief after cooking something big. And the handles make it comfortable to carry even with a heavy bird.
customer_reviews.author: Todd Pixton

customer_reviews.title: Great roasting pan!
customer_reviews.text: I am so grateful to finally have a good roasting pan. I basically ruined an aluminum cake pan that I had been using with a cheap insert. This is the way to go! Easy to clean and roasted fabulously. Much more versatile as I can put it on the stove top too! I can't imagine anyone being disappointed with this pan.
customer_reviews.author: Susan in Chico, CA

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Thanksgiving roast
customer_reviews.text: After years of using my grandmother's pan, I finally decided to upgrade abd I'm glad I did.
customer_reviews.author: Alpo

customer_reviews.title: excellent roasting pan
customer_reviews.text: a very good buy, did an excellent job on Thanksgiving Day with the turkey, so much so that the following weekend I roasted a large chicken that was awesome as well. Cleans up easy and easy to lift the bird out of the roaster.
customer_reviews.author: NH Grandpa

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Great presentation.
customer_reviews.text: Exceptional product. Received day before Thanksgiving. Has served us well. Still looks better than anything we cook in it.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Eichinger

customer_reviews.title: Great roasting pan
customer_reviews.text: Great roasting pan. Easy to clean, cooks evenly. The only small complaint is the handles curve in. I'd rather them have some offset and not curve into the cooking area. I'll be using this for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Gray

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product.
customer_reviews.text: I shopped a long time to get just the right roaster and this is it. Excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: But the pan cooks very evenly and is easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: I wish they had not changed the design of the handles. These are very uncomfortable. But the pan cooks very evenly and is easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Kroeger

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I wish I had purchased this years ago. Both truly elegant and highly functional.
customer_reviews.author: J Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Bad product
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality . It is very lightweight. The product description claims triply construction, the box describes it as "triply performance"???
customer_reviews.author: Marion  Levy

customer_reviews.title: great pan
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Seemed a little pricey but the quality is very good, and you get what you pay for. Easy to move turkey around on the rack, easy to remove heavy pan with turkey from the oven with the side handles. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: L. Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent pan.
customer_reviews.text: Was a Christmas gift. Mom loved it used it right away. Turkey came out beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks beautiful and is very durable
customer_reviews.text: Love the classic yet clean look of this pan. It's very durable and pretty easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Roasting Pan
customer_reviews.text: This pan is heavy, well made, and cleans up beautifully. After roasting it can also be used on the stovetop for making gravy.
customer_reviews.author: Corky

customer_reviews.title: just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: use this all of the time, fits a 24 pound turkey, great for rib roasts, cleans easily
customer_reviews.author: Michael Kell

customer_reviews.title: Good But Expensive
customer_reviews.text: Beautifully made, but very expensive for a roasting pan. Many other very good pans on the market for less money.
customer_reviews.author: G Siegal

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic pan, good buy
customer_reviews.text: Roasted our thanksgiving turkey in this and it was perfect. The pan looks fantastic as well. The balanced heat from the core is well worth the cost. Quality addition to my kitchen equipment and well worth it for the occasional roast.
customer_reviews.author: Erin N. Terlson

customer_reviews.title: The pan itself is great, but the protective coating on the bottom of ...
customer_reviews.text: The pan itself is great, but the protective coating on the bottom of the rack started coming off after three uses. Now it is beginning to rust.
customer_reviews.author: Traci

customer_reviews.title: This is the roaster to get!!!
customer_reviews.text: Thanksgiving has come and gone, so now I can officially say this is the BEST ROASTER EVER!!! We did the Julia Child's deconstructed turkey with the stuffing under the bird and everything came out perfect. Stuffing browned, not overdone, turkey was beautiful. Lots of oooh's and aaah's. I really like the weight of the pan, not overly heavy, but very sturdy, nice big handles you can really get a hold of even with a mitt on. This roaster will last the rest of my days and then some.
customer_reviews.author: Wanna be a Tropical Girl

customer_reviews.title: Roasting pan was great for my turkey
customer_reviews.text: Roasting pan was great for my turkey! Only complaint would be that the roasting rack slides around in the pan. Not sure how that would be solved but I still love the pan.
customer_reviews.author: Jill P Stewart

customer_reviews.title: They think it is the best thing that has ever happened
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for the cooks at my church. They think it is the best thing that has ever happened.
customer_reviews.author: C. Laney-MacLuan

customer_reviews.title: Great results cooking a beerf tenderloin and roasted chicken
customer_reviews.text: Have used twice. Great results cooking a beerf tenderloin and roasted chicken. Large enough to fit a 5lb tenderloin. Great heat distribution
customer_reviews.author: Paola

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great! Well constructed, sturdy, and easy to clean. This seems to be the only roasting pan you will need.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Joe Poe

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this pan! It's so large, I never have to worry about spill-over.
customer_reviews.author: Katie in WI

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Value
customer_reviews.text: Although a little more costly than others - well worth it! Even heat distribution;easy to handle;easy clean up. See Country Kitchen reviews for their rating.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie E.

customer_reviews.title: Simply excellent
customer_reviews.text: The title says it all--this pan was great for roasting my turkey this Thanksgiving, going from oven to stovetop for gravy-making with ease. I expect it will last forever. I couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Angus

customer_reviews.title: Great pan.
customer_reviews.text: Did an awesome job with a 13lb turkey. Very easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew S.

customer_reviews.title: but like the weight and style
customer_reviews.text: Haven't used it yet, but like the weight and style? Fast delivery!
customer_reviews.author: CAC Klein

customer_reviews.title: Gave as a gift to a picky mom
customer_reviews.text: She loves it. It is nice and heavy and sturdy, a good size. So far the rack is okay, we'll see how it holds up.
customer_reviews.author: RobynB

customer_reviews.title: Great Turkey Roasting Pan with Rack
customer_reviews.text: Although this pan is more on the expensive side, it performed fantastic on cooking its first turkey this past Thanksgiving! Solid construction and easy to clean, I will never have to buy another roasting pan again (versus the non-stick ones that once they are stratched, they are done)... I would recommend this pan to anyone who likes to buy a product for the 'long haul'... Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Biscuits reviews

customer_reviews.title: Roaster is an excellent product. The rack not so great
customer_reviews.text: Roaster is an excellent product. The rack not so great. The rack is too small for the size of the roaster. It slides around and can be dangerous.
customer_reviews.author: Victor Almonte

customer_reviews.title: And I love the fact that both the rack and the pan ...
customer_reviews.text: I can't take any credit for this purchase, but my husband loves it! And I love the fact that both the rack and the pan can go in the dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: Ginger Seneker

customer_reviews.title: Pricey but beautiful and functional
customer_reviews.text: I have all Calphalon cookware so I went ahead and bought this too. Heavy gage material, roasted like a charm, easy to make gravy afterwards and even clean up was quick. This year's turkey was the most beautiful and juiciest ever. All this and it looked gorgeous, too. I know there are lot of cheaper roasting pans but overall I am thrilled with this one.
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia M. Dobo

customer_reviews.title: Very nice pan
customer_reviews.text: Price is a good value, given the quality. Pan is very hefty and well constructed. The rack seems fine too.
customer_reviews.author: DN

customer_reviews.title: Great roasting pan
customer_reviews.text: We bought the Calphalon roasting pan after reviewing many styles in stores and on-line. It was priced well by Amazon and my son gave my wife a gift certificate to Amazon. The pan was used the day it arrived to cook a turkey. My wife was overly pleased with the rack, its fit in the oven and the large handles. She now uses it for chicken, roasts and turkey. It is very easy to clean, the stainless steel is truly stainless. I get the job of cleaning and there is no scrubbing on this one. We are very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Robert A. Blaney

customer_reviews.title: great roaster,greatprice
customer_reviews.text: this is by far the best stainless roaster on the market for the money,good weight to the pan, great in oven and for deglazing on stovetop. I am very happy i purchased this and will probably not buy another roaster for a long time
customer_reviews.author: R Scuzzarella

customer_reviews.title: I have enjoyed every encounter with this product
customer_reviews.text: It is the olla(cooking pan) of your dreams! The reflective surface enhances ones ability to form a crisp outer layer without overcooking the inside of the meat. I have enjoyed every encounter with this product!
customer_reviews.author: stanley e. derusha

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful pan !!
customer_reviews.text: This pan is what I wanted and more. It is beautiful, with the mirrored finish. It is heavy duty, the handles are easy to use with a potholder or alone. We made our Thanksgiving turkey in it, it worked great and the lift out rack is nice also, rack keeps meat off from bottom of pan. I was worried how it would clean up but it cleaned beautifully, very easy clean up. Might have cost a bit more but I always say you get what you pay for and it is well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Holt

customer_reviews.title: Has a raised center section in the bottom of the ...
customer_reviews.text: Has a raised center section in the bottom of the pan which makes it harder 2 make gravy or sauces.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: This roasts a variety of meats to perfection and cleanup is a snap.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Baker

product_meta.title: Calphalon Contemporary 16-Inch Stainless Steel Roasting Pan with Rack
product_meta.description: Clean lines and curves crafted from lustrous, brushed stainless steel combine sophisticated style with the professional performance you expect from all Calphalon cookware. The roasting pan has a heavy-gauge aluminum core sandwiched between two layers of stainless steel by means of high-heat, high-pressure impact bonding for extreme durability. Aluminum core provides superior conductivity and even heating for excellent browning and control of the cooking process. Non-porous stainless steel cooking surface is safe for use with all utensils. Clear tempered-glass lids let you see food while it's cooking and are oven safe, so you can finish covered dishes in the oven or keep them warm until ready to serve. Holds up to a 25-pound turkey. Triple-riveted handles make lifting and turning easy. Goes from oven to stove, ideal for making gravy. Nonstick roasting rack lets heat circulate, for crisp browning. The brushed stainless steel handles are make it easy to lift even when full. All cookware is dishwasher-safe and carries Calphalon's full lifetime warranty.
feature_bullets: A heavy-gauge aluminum core is sandwiched between two layers of stainless steel by means of high-heat, high-pressure impact bonding for extreme durability.

Roasting pan aluminum core provides superior conductivity and even heating for excellent browning and control of the cooking process. Non-porous stainless steel cooking surface is safe for use with all utensils.

Roasting rack holds up to a 25-pound turkey. Triple-riveted handles make lifting and turning easy. Goes from oven to stove, ideal for making gravy. Nonstick V-Rack lets heat circulate, for crisp browning.
The brushed stainless steel handles are make it easy to lift even when full. All cookware is dishwasher-safe and carries Calphalon's full lifetime warranty.
